name: Bella
bio: Bella is a 1 year old pit bull/lab mix. She is an extremely sweet dog who loves to be around people. She can be a little jumpy sometimes, so she'll need to be taught not to jump on people.

name: Athena
bio: Athena is a black kitten who loves to be held, and is extremely playful. She enjoys being held because she was bottle fed, but she does wake up her owners early in the morning sometimes though.

name: Loki
bio: Loki is a 2 month old male black kitten who is looking for a home! He enjoys playing with his toys and others. We suggest a home that already has a cat and/or cats as he is very social.
